  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ProcessorServicesOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements ProcessorServicesI
    The class ProcessorServicesOutboundPort defines an outbound port associated with the interface ProcessorServicesI.

     invariant      true

      • executeTaskOnCoreAndNotify

        public void executeTaskOnCoreAndNotify(TaskI t,
                              int coreNo,
                              java.lang.String notificationPortURI)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ProcessorServicesI
        execute a task on a given core and notify the end of the task through a port which URI is given. The port which URI is given must implement the interface ProcessorServicesNotificationI.

        Contract

         pre    t != null && isValidCoreNo(coreNo) && notificationPortURI != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        executeTaskOnCoreAndNotify in interface ProcessorServicesI
        Parameters:
        t - task to be executed.
        coreNo - number of the core on which t must be executed.
        notificationPortURI - URI of the port to which the end of the task will be notified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        ProcessorServicesI.executeTaskOnCoreAndNotify(fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm.interfaces.TaskI, int, java.lang.String)
